#Load example data

Load data from the KNB for generating plots

```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(ggplot2)
  library(tidyr)
  library(dplyr)
  library(DT)
})

# https://knb.ecoinformatics.org/#view/urn:uuid:e05865d7-678d-4513-9061-2ab7d979f8e7
# Search 'permit value'
permits <- read.csv(url("https://knb.ecoinformatics.org/knb/d1/mn/v2/object/urn%3Auuid%3Aa3c58bd6-481e-4c64-aa93-795df10a4664", method = "libcurl"),
                    stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

datatable(permits)
```

#Start exploring ggplot

```{r}
ggplot(permits, aes(x = Value, y = StdDev, color = Region, shape = Gear)) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
ggplot(permits, aes(x = Value, y = StdDev, shape = Gear)) +
  geom_point(color = 'blue')
```
#Make a histogram

```{r}
ggplot(permits, aes(Value)) + 
  geom_histogram()
```

#Boxplot

```{r}
ggplot(permits, aes(Gear, Value)) + 
  geom_boxplot()
```
#Scatter

```{r}
permits_se_seine <- permits %>% 
  filter(Gear == "Purse Seine", 
         Region == "Southeast")

ggplot(permits_se_seine, aes(Year, Value)) + 
  geom_point() +
  geom_line()
```

#Working with themes 
    Skipping through sections
    
```{r}
my_theme <- theme_bw() +
  theme(legend.title = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.major = element_line(size = 1, linetype = 4),
        panel.grid.minor = element_blank())

ggplot(permits, aes(Value, StdDev, color = Gear)) +
  geom_point() +
  my_theme
```

##multipanel plots

```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(gridExtra)
})

p1 <- ggplot(permits, aes(Year, Value)) + ##different data subset in online tutorial
  geom_point() + 
  geom_line()

p2 <- ggplot(permits %>% filter(Gear == "Purse Seine"), aes(Region, Value)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = function(x) { format(x, scientific = FALSE) })

grid.arrange(p1, p2)
```
